channel.title: Want to know how to edit
channel.description:
Hey, thanks for reading this thread,
I need to know how to manually edit the character/savegame file so i can edit like, each item they have, or convert the server so it only allows spawn on Admin rank+
the server is: 659, Nexon-world base source.
Thanks to those that could help me :D
